attributes.action: stop mass imigration to safe guard our sibblings future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that enough is enough and that the people of the uk have a right to express that we have had enough of being treated as second class citizens in our own country.and that the mass influx will be damaging to our childrens future

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
